name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 1 Skill Point.

name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and Basic ATK DMG increases by 10%.

name: Knight of Purity Palace
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield created by the wearer by 20%.

name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

name: Champion of Streetwise Boxing
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by 5% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

name: Guard of Wuthering Snow
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than 50%, restores HP equal to 8% of their Max HP and regenerates 5 Energy.

name: Firesmith of Lava-Forging
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: Increases the wearer's Skill DMG by 12%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by 12% for the next attack.

name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

name: Band of Sizzling Thunder
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).

name: Eagle of Twilight Line
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

name: Thief of Shooting Meteor
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates 3 Energy.

name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and their CRIT DMG increases by 20% against Imprisoned enemies.

name: Longevous Disciple
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.

name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
twoPieceSetEffect: 2-Pc: Increases the DMG dealt by follow-up attacks by 20%.
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks, increases the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack up to 8 time(s) and lasts for 3 turn(s). This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

name: Prisoner in Deep Confinement
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of its DEF when dealing DMG to it. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
twoPieceSetEffect: 2-Pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%.
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer's attacks against enemies with at least 2/4 debuffs deal 8%/12% CRIT DMG. Upon inflicting a debuff on an enemy, this skill's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG bonuses are doubled for 1 turn(s).

name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
fourPieceSetEffect: 4-Pc: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, Break Effect for all allies increases by 24% for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.
